Two treatises the first of death, on I Cor. 15:26, the second of judgment on 2 Cor. 5:10, 11 / by Rich. Baxter. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Treatise of death.
[5], 32, [4], 159 p., [16], 174 p.
Printed for Nevil Simmons ..., London : 1672.
Each treatise has special t.p. and separate paging. Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: the second treatise (p. [16], 174) is lacking on film.
=======

Printed for Nevil Simmons ..., London : 1672.
